metadata.synopsis: Laezel says Vlaakith must have ordered the Creche to kill her. Says  they must fight their way through. If not been to the Zaithisk yet, she says they must go.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Plays when Laezel encounters an enemy in the Creche after the Inquisitor fight.

0.speaker: Lae'zel
0.text: Tsk'va - my own people seek my head.

2.speaker: Lae'zel
2.text: To the zaith'isk. To the cure!

1.speaker: Lae'zel
1.text: If they will not see sense, then bleed them dry!
